#!/bin//bash

export NOW="$(date +"%Y-%m-%d")"
export DATA_DIR=backup
export DATA_DATABASE=dress
mysqldump --opt -uroot  -p'P@ssw0rd' -h'h2.jaxiu.cn' $DATA_DATABASE > $DATA_DIR/${DATA_DATABASE}_$NOW.sql
